attributes.additional_details: Bring it up at the national stage at PMQ
attributes.background: Locally elected MP to bring up the current Warrington bin strikes at PMQ. This is a public health situation with residential bins not collected properly since the start of October 2023.

rejection.details:
We can’t accept petitions that request action at a local level or which are about issues that are the responsibility of local councils. 

You could contact your MP directly about this issue. You can find contact details for your local MP here: https://members.parliament.uk/FindYourMP

You could also raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them here:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could also petition your local council. You can find more information here: https://www.warrington.gov.uk/petitions
